content: You already found me a cozy little nook for cloud-watching? Looks like we do have a little bond, baa~.
I can't wait... The cloud-watching nook you've set up on your planet... It's bound to be floofalicious and lovely, just like you.
Then, let me find a sunny day, bring my little plushies, and come to your planet... so we can be two carefree clouds together.
